nodes.excerpt: A powerful no-code headless commerce landing page builder with customizable, built-in checkouts 🌐 Create shoppable landing pages for limited product releases, campaigns, PPC campaigns & more ✅ Syncs with Shopify 🛍 Powered by Commerce.js, Next.js, and Vercel

nodes.excerpt: Duffel makes travel selling easy, fast, and developer-friendly. Our API enables any travel business to start selling flights from a network of leading airlines in minutes, not months.
nodes.title: Duffel - The best API to sell flights online
nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Duffel让旅游销售变得简单、快捷、方便开发者。我们的API使任何旅游企业能够在几分钟内，而不是几个月内开始销售领先航空公司网络的航班。
localize.tagline: 在线销售航班的最佳API

nodes.excerpt: Apart from Paperform's in-house experts, we reached out to the design community to gain insights into what makes a good form great 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful
nodes.title: Form Design Ebook - A comprehensive guide on why form design is critical to UX.
nodes.author: Dean McPherson

localize.description: 除了Paperform的内部专家外，我们还联系了设计社区，以深入了解如何使一个好的表单变得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指导为什么表单设计对用户体验至关重要。

localize.description: 除了Paperform的內部專家外，我們還聯繫了設計社區，以深入瞭解如何使一個好的表單變得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指導爲什麼表單設計對用戶體驗至關重要。

nodes.excerpt: 😺 PH Launch KIT is an all in one product for makers, indiehackers and product owners who feel frustrated with launching on Product Hunt. 2 months on R&D, detailed 25-step launch guide, 1300+ Design Assets, exclusive community for creators and more!

localize.description: 😺 PH Launch KIT是一款为在Product Hunt上发布感到挫折的制造者、独立黑客和产品所有者提供的一体化产品。2个月的研发时间，详细的25步发布指南，1300+设计资产，创作者专属社区等等。
localize.tagline: 你需要的一切成功的PH启动! (非官方)

nodes.excerpt: Polotno Studio is a design editor. Use the large library of photos and vector illustrations to create images for social media, youtube previews, covers, presentations.
nodes.title: Polotno Studio - Canva-like design editor. No signups, no ads, no paywalls.
nodes.author: Anton Lavrenov

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款设计编辑器。使用大量的照片和矢量插图库，为社交媒体、youtube预览、封面、演示文稿创建图像。
localize.tagline: 类似Canva的设计编辑器。没有注册，没有广告，没有付费墙。

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款設計編輯器。使用大量的照片和矢量插圖庫，爲社交媒體、youtube預覽、封面、演示文稿創建圖像。
localize.tagline: 類似Canva的設計編輯器。沒有註冊，沒有廣告，沒有付費牆。

nodes.excerpt: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice
nodes.title: Rezi 3.0 - GPT-3 resume builder
nodes.author: Jacob Jacquet

localize.description: 您的简历是您求职中最重要的部分，但也是最难做好的部分之一。Rezi通过我们的人工智能驱动的简历生成器，为你生成完美的简历内容，让你轻松搞定。TL;DR: 不错
localize.tagline: GPT-3简历制作器

localize.description: 您的簡歷是您求職中最重要的部分，但也是最難做好的部分之一。Rezi通過我們的人工智能驅動的簡歷生成器，爲你生成完美的簡歷內容，讓你輕鬆搞定。TL;DR: 不錯
localize.tagline: GPT-3簡歷製作器

nodes.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
nodes.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.
nodes.author: Mike McMillan

localize.description: Rollcall可以让您轻松组织任何时区的远程会议。添加到Slack，创建一个议程，安排一个时间框架，Rollcall机器人以文本，纯音频，屏幕共享和视频格式收集你的摊位。
localize.tagline: Slack中的异步站立会议。

localize.description: Rollcall可以讓您輕鬆組織任何時區的遠程會議。添加到Slack，創建一個議程，安排一個時間框架，Rollcall機器人以文本，純音頻，屏幕共享和視頻格式收集你的攤位。
localize.tagline: Slack中的異步站立會議。

nodes.excerpt: Discovering & outreaching new leads through LinkedIn has never been easier than with Skylead. With our brand new email & hyper-image personalization features, you’ll be able to take communication to a whole new level and skyrocket your sales processes.
nodes.title: Skylead - Leverage LinkedIn & email to generate leads better than ever
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: 通过LinkedIn发现和拓展新的潜在客户从来没有像Skylead这样容易。凭借我们全新的电子邮件和超图像个性化功能，您将能够将沟通提升到一个全新的水平，并使您的销售流程飞速发展。
localize.tagline: 利用LinkedIn和电子邮件产生比以往更好的潜在客户。

localize.description: 通過LinkedIn發現和拓展新的潛在客戶從來沒有像Skylead這樣容易。憑藉我們全新的電子郵件和超圖像個性化功能，您將能夠將溝通提升到一個全新的水平，並使您的銷售流程飛速發展。
localize.tagline: 利用LinkedIn和電子郵件產生比以往更好的潛在客戶。

nodes.excerpt: Read 50 pages (digital or physical) covering the best tweets from every month of 2020, class photos of the coolest people on Tech Twitter, and superlatives for Dankest Memes, Influencer of the Year, and more.

nodes.excerpt: With this templated UX audit checklist, you can uncover 90% of the usability issues on your website or app. It includes over 100 unique criteria & is totally free! ⠀ Because it's a Notion pack, you can duplicate, customize & use it forever. ♾️

localize.description: 通过这个模板化的用户体验审核清单，你可以发现你的网站或应用中90%的可用性问题。它包括100多个独特的标准，而且完全免费。⠀因为它是一个Notion包，你可以复制，定制和永远使用它。♾️
localize.tagline: 发现网站90%的可用性问题。

nodes.excerpt: InScheduler is an easy to use booking platform that allows hair salons, barbershops, and spas to enable their customers to schedule appointments directly from their website and schedule their staff.
nodes.title: InScheduler - A booking widget that makes scheduling quick and easy
nodes.author: Areeb Akhter

localize.description: InScheduler是一个易于使用的预订平台，允许发廊、理发店和水疗中心使他们的客户直接从他们的网站上安排预约，并安排他们的员工。
localize.tagline: 一个预订小工具，使调度快速和简单的。

localize.description: InScheduler是一個易於使用的預訂平臺，允許髮廊、理髮店和水療中心使他們的客戶直接從他們的網站上安排預約，並安排他們的員工。
localize.tagline: 一個預訂小工具，使調度快速和簡單的。

nodes.excerpt: Your life is full of projects, and [whether you like it or not] you are a project manager. Get all the most relevant core concepts of project management in one place, written by a 5-year Program manager with a PMP. P.S. This is my first published product!
nodes.title: Project Management Core Concepts - Book on core concepts of project management in plain English
nodes.author: Josh Newman

localize.description: 你的生活充满了项目，[不管你是否喜欢]你是一个项目经理。在一个地方得到所有最相关的项目管理的核心概念，由一个5年的项目经理与PMP写。P.S.这是我的第一本出版的产品!
localize.tagline: 用浅显的英语介绍项目管理的核心概念的书。

localize.tagline: 保持在您的列表之上。

localize.tagline: 保持在您的列表之上。

nodes.excerpt: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
nodes.title: FounderZ - Free app for founders to manage the fund raising process
nodes.author: Sridhar Machiroutu

localize.description: 一款帮助创始人管理投资人追求过程的免费应用。如果你认识一个创始人在筹集资金，或者计划有一天自己也要这样做，这是一个必须要做的事情。我们将向今年创业的人免费提供在我们平台上创建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 创始人管理筹资过程的免费应用。

localize.description: 一款幫助創始人管理投資人追求過程的免費應用。如果你認識一個創始人在籌集資金，或者計劃有一天自己也要這樣做，這是一個必須要做的事情。我們將向今年創業的人免費提供在我們平臺上創建的FounderZ。

nodes.excerpt: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
nodes.title: PalPark - Curate and share your learnings by topics
nodes.author: Yixin Kou

localize.description: 如果你喜欢主题式学习，这就是你的选择! 用策展和创作来组织你的学习之旅。分享知识集锦，与同行共同受益和讨论。围绕你的学习组合建立你的个人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主题策划和分享您的学习成果

localize.description: 如果你喜歡主題式學習，這就是你的選擇! 用策展和創作來組織你的學習之旅。分享知識集錦，與同行共同受益和討論。圍繞你的學習組合建立你的個人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主題策劃和分享您的學習成果

nodes.excerpt: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospects’ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
nodes.title: The Intricately Assistant - A new chrome extension to accelerate your sales prospecting
nodes.author: Sarah E. Brown

localize.description: Intricately Assistant与谷歌Chrome浏览器并驾齐驱，自动显示你和你的团队研究的潜在客户的实时云数据。在我们迄今为止最具可操作性的交付平台上，查看您的潜在客户的云足迹。
localize.tagline: 一个新的chrome扩展，以加快您的销售前景。

localize.description: Intricately Assistant與谷歌Chrome瀏覽器並駕齊驅，自動顯示你和你的團隊研究的潛在客戶的實時雲數據。在我們迄今爲止最具可操作性的交付平臺上，查看您的潛在客戶的雲足跡。
localize.tagline: 一個新的chrome擴展，以加快您的銷售前景。

nodes.excerpt: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
nodes.title: Time Capsule - Transform your 2020 into a tiny, personalized book for free!
nodes.author: Zaake De Coninck

localize.description: 回答几个问题，我们将把你的记忆变成一本小小的、个性化的书，里面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事实，包括来自你的家乡 ✔️奇思妙想的插图 100%免费，你将在10分钟内收到你的小册子!
localize.tagline: 将你的2020年免费改造成一本小小的个性书!

localize.description: 回答幾個問題，我們將把你的記憶變成一本小小的、個性化的書，裏面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事實，包括來自你的家鄉 ✔️奇思妙想的插圖 100%免費，你將在10分鐘內收到你的小冊子!
localize.tagline: 將你的2020年免費改造成一本小小的個性書!

nodes.excerpt: Free mobile app that helps the 50 million microbusinesses in Latin America become more efficient. The app allows owners to record transactions, track credits and debits, see business statistics, gain control over their inventory, among many other things.

nodes.excerpt: Websu.io helps you optimize your web applications for speed by generating detailed speed reports. The speed reports are run using Chrome and show you how you can optimize your web application to improve the performance.
nodes.title: Websu - Open source website speed, optimization & monitoring service
nodes.author: Sam Stoelinga

localize.description: Websu.io通过生成详细的速度报告，帮助您优化网络应用的速度。这些速度报告使用Chrome浏览器运行，并向您展示如何优化您的Web应用程序以提高性能。
localize.tagline: 开源网站速度、优化和监控服务

localize.description: Websu.io通過生成詳細的速度報告，幫助您優化網絡應用的速度。這些速度報告使用Chrome瀏覽器運行，並向您展示如何優化您的Web應用程序以提高性能。
localize.tagline: 開源網站速度、優化和監控服務

nodes.title:
In a letter to President Joe Biden, https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN on Wednesday offered to use its vast logistical resources to help distribute COVID-19 vaccines in the U.S.
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W
nodes.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
周三，https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN，在给美国总统乔-拜登的信中，表示愿意利用其庞大的后勤资源，帮助在美国分发COVID-19疫苗。
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W

週三，https://t.co/7MqbvX6EpN，在給美國總統喬-拜登的信中，表示願意利用其龐大的後勤資源，幫助在美國分發COVID-19疫苗。
https://t.co/oeYHWevA1W
